channel.title: In my server, people start with 10hp, cb 5... how i make it cb 41 hp 99..?
channel.description:
The title says it all......
And if u could be kind enough... how do i change xp for different stats?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 03:40:52 AM[/size][hr]OMFG HELP PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 04:04:02 AM[/size][hr]Omfg... -.-. .... . .. . . . . . . . . . . . .

item.title: In my server, people start with 10hp, cb 5... how i make it cb 41 hp 99..?
item.dc:creator: @wileriz wileriz
item.description:
@wileriz wrote:

Step 1:
Open up Client.Java and search for

if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) < 10) { playerXP[3] = 650;

Replace that with…

if(getLevelForXP*SoD*(playerXP[3]) > *99*) { playerXP[3] = 14000000;

Step 2:
Open up Players.java and search for

playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 650;

Replace that with

playerLevel[i] = 90; playerXP[i] = 14000000;

I thik what forks

Credits: [size=10pt]ninjasod[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: In my server, people start with 10hp, cb 5... how i make it cb 41 hp 99..?
